name: 塔尔·坎特
awards: 2024年 第96届奥斯卡金像奖 最佳动画短片 (提名) 给猪的信
introduction: (b. 1988, Jerusalem) is an independent Animation Filmmaker & Visual Artist.[B.F.A] Graduated with honors from the 'Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design', Screen-Based Arts Department, 2015.  An exchange program at the 'School of the Art Institute of Chicago' at the Film, Video, New Media and Animation department, 2013.Art director at the documentary feature film "Advocate" (directed by Philippe Bellaïche & Rachel Leah Jones), Oscars Shortlisted & Official selection at Sundance Film Festival 2019.Lecturer at Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, [Animation].Curator of Animation Exhibitions & special screening programs, Writer and Editor at the Israeli animation magazine 'Moonfash'.Currently, she works on her next short animated film while working as an Animation Director &  Concept-Art developer at several film projects.
